comments:
If I define a plug-in with no version number, the workspace does not start-up 
and the message is not clear about the problem. We do not get a .log, only a 
message in the console. BTW, because "copy" is not working in the console, 
I'll reproduce only the first lines of the exception:

Exception launching the Eclipse Platform UI:
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException: 
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException: java.lang.NullPointerException
  at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.model.PluginRegistryModel.removePlugin
(PluginRegistryModel.java:305)
  at org.eclipse.core.internal.plugins.RegistryResolver.trimRegistry
(RegistryResolver.java:1093)
...

Fixed.  Now catching this case in RegistryLoader.  Opened separate PR for test 
cases.
